channel.title: CVE Feed for deepakkite -- WordPress File Sharing Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for deepakkite -- WordPress File Sharing Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-4636|2024-08-02T07:31:06.688Z -- deepakkite -- wordpress%20file%20sharing%20plugin
item.description: The WordPress File Sharing Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via admin settings in versions up to, and including, 2.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.
